issue.title: [CF 368] Metaicons within metaicons not working
issue.body:
Metaicons within metaicons stopped working with the last update. Is this intended? Is there some other function that is supposed to replace this? Or is it just a bug?


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #368 | Raw

comments.body:
Probably a bug. I did break it once (while i was implementing the feature to allow meta icons to check a whole group), but fixed it right after, and I thought it was working after that.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I'll test it with your profile and see what I can figure out.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

It seems to be working for me. Could you post an export string of something that isn't working?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

The first picture shows r331. Note in the center there is a Charge and a Mortal Strike icon.

http://i.imgur.com/5mnRs.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/Z2WZe.jpg

The second picture is r333. Charge is still visible, because it's just a normal icon within a metaicon. Mortal Strike however is absent where the red box now is. In the yellow box you can see both metaicons that should feed into the center. They are clearly functional. The Rend-metaicon should be hiding behind Charge, but once I go into meleerange and Charge disappeares, Rend is also absent.
